title: Halloween Crowd Surge Leaves Dozens Dead in Seoul
description: Officials in Seoul said that dozens of people were dead and many others injured after a stampede in the capital cityâ€™s popular Itaewon district, where crowds had gathered to celebrate Halloween.
dc:creator: Matej Leskovsek
